knimeNode.name: RDKit R-Group Decomposition
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs an R-Group decomposition for an input RDKit Mol column.

fullDescription.intro: Performs an R-Group decomposition for an input RDKit Mol column. The algorithm in RDKit was developed in 2018/2019. It is still in beta state and should be used with care. Results may vary in later versions.

tab.name: Options

option.name: Input Molecules - RDKit Mol column (1st table)
Input Scaffolds - Core Input Column (2nd table)

tab.option: If second table is connected, the column containing cores as RDKit Molecules, SMARTS, SMILES or SDF.
If no second table is connected, one or multiple new-line separated SMARTS can be defined as the cores to be used.

option.name: Output Handling - Fail if no matching R-Groups are found

tab.option: Flag to be set to detect Rx columns that are completely empty and remove them.

option.name: Output Handling - Fail if no cores are matching at all

tab.option: Flag to be set to let the node fail if no matches for the provided cores have been found at all.

tab.name: Advanced

option.name: Labels to recognize R-Groups in scaffolds

tab.option: Enable or disable one or multiple labels to be used to recognize R-Groups in scaffolds. At least one item need to be picked.
